name: Horeca Vlaanderen
goal: Horeca Vlaanderen is the employer's organization for the hospitality sector in Flanders. We defend the intrests of the sector in all fields.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Food Safety, Public Health, Taxation
euInitiatives: The European activities mainly happen within our European umbrella-organization, HOTREC, but Horeca Vlaanderen also develops general contacts with Belgian MEP's and specific contacts (f. ex. on fair trade) with DG's.
